Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS!!!
Reviews.Author: MDRUMHELLER
Reviews.Content: First, some things you should know:1. The instructions provided do not offer ANY information hardly.2. The top left slot in the back of the phone is for your SD Card, the two in the upper right are SIM1 and SIM2. NOTE: THIS PHONE ACCEPTS STANDARD SIM CARDS ONLY! IF YOU HAVE A MICRO OR NANO SIM, YOU CAN BUY AN ADAPTER TO USE YOUR MICRO OR NANO SIM BUT FIT THE STANDARD SLOT FOR LIKE .99 ON EBAY OR AMAZON. Nobody told me this and since the instructions offered little help, I was stuck trying to figure out how to put my micro sim in it. lol.Other than that, this phone is a great product! Very well built! User friendly! It's my perfect smartphone. I have always loved the look of the iphone but the ability to customize my OS. I have always said if Iphone and Android got together and had a baby it would be my perfect phone, and here it is....what's more...at like a 5th of the price! I highly recommend! Also, it doesn't say this, but my phone came with Android 4.0.3 installed along with the Google Play store and other Google apps, something users buying non-brand android products always worry about!Hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: Looks like an Iphone 4 and does FUNCTION
Reviews.Author: Adolfo Matos
Reviews.Content: "You get what you pay for"It looks just like an an Iphone 4 and even came with a case, which was a surprise. It came with two batteries and has dual sim card . I bought it as a gift and only for that.  The camera is low quality on both sides. The screens brightness is minimal. The calling quality is pretty good and the speaker phone compares to store bought phones. If you want to ease yourself into the Iphone trend , this ancient Chinese secret will give you that facade.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: J Bailey
Reviews.Content: Pros:- compact size- works with Tmobile SIM cards (voice & text, can't confirm 3G data)- my light usage resulted in 2 days of battery life.Cons:- bulky charger/converter combo- occasional freezes when exiting app in landscape mode to the Home screen.- Android ICS 3 soft Navigation buttons not present (Hopefully I haven't missed a setting to enable them). Recent apps is the button I needed so I installed "Recent Apps Quick Button" app and placed icon in the Favorites tray.- No default notifications for missed calls/texts when phone is sleeping. Installed NoLED app to show icons on screen.- availabilty of accessories. It takes a lot of trial & error with iphone 4 stuff.The phone arrived within a week. After a few weeks of use this phone has been perfect for me.My mobile phone usage pattern is mainly voice and text. I rarely use data, so no need for web browsing, email, content streaming, GPS, camera etc. I didn't need a big GPS screen type phone.My previous phone was Motorola flip phone with Tmobile Pay As You Go by the minute plan.I needed a phone for voice and more texting, so I went with this as my first Android phone.The included manual doesn't provide much information. Based on comments from others I supplemented it with the ICS 4.0 user guide for the Galaxy Nexus from Google.I inserted my Tmobile SIM in one of the slots and it worked right away.When the phone is powered on it generates a log entry that a second SIM is not detected.I have now converted to Tmobile monthly Pay As You Go plan. I also added a G.Skill 16GB MicroSDHC class 6 card.The screen size may be small but it is OK for me. I have it set to the Extra large font so I can read it without my glasses.I carry the phone easily in my front pant pocket. I just have to make sure the phone is locked first. If it isn't, it will be on a screen 4 menus deep when I next unlock it.The USB charger is very bulky. It is the international charger with dual round plugs. The phone includes a converter to dual spaded plugs. I can plug it into a wall plug but the charger keeps slipping out of the converter. It also takes up a lot of room.I now have it plugged into a power strip so the charger fits into the converter vertically.Phone was rooted using the TPSparkyRoot procedure.Most of the apps I have installed were based on recommendations from friends. I have loaded the following successfully so far:Droidwall - firewall programTitanium Backup Pro -Comodo Mobile Security - anti-virus and malware scanner.Comodo Battery Saver - provides quick access to turning phone features on/off.Recent Apps Quick Button - provides quick access to the open Apps list.NoLED - takes a lot of tweaking to get the settings correct but it is worth it. When a notification is active it increases battery drain.Swype Beta - replacement keyboard. No more pecking at the keyboard.TouchPal Contacts - dialer which allows you to assign gestures to your contacts.There are a lot of comments on the amazon uk site worth taking a look at.The phone will occasionally freeze for about 10 secs when transitioning from an app in landscape mode to the Home screen in potrait mode. It runs fine once this is done. It hasn't happened under any other circumstance.I am having trouble finding a slim case for this phone.I have tried one of the bumper cases from china. It fit OK around the phone but the depth front to back was too small.I have an aluminium case on order. The rear of the case with the screws will face forward, but hopefully it fits.I bought some front/back screen protectors for an iphone 4. They front one was about 1mm too narrow on the width and the back camera opening is a little too high.Someone on Amazon UK spoke of modifying a flip case, but I am not at that point yet.The Wireless-G reception is not as good as my laptop. I am not able to compare it to other phones or tablets.

Reviews.Title: ITS BEEN OVER A MONTH
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone the beginning of JULY it is now the middle of AUGUST. I am OUTRAGED and expect a full refund. this is absolutely rediculous. I have been asked TWICE to rate my transaction, and i still havent even gotten it. I need a phone! Not happy. DO NOT BUY

Reviews.Title: Android Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Michaela Tanksley
Reviews.Content: I like it. It works good. It was delivered right on time. No problems as of yet. Phone is compatible with tmobile. Everything was new as expected. It met my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Good phone but!
Reviews.Author: wmr
Reviews.Content: I deleted my review because I have learned some more about this phone. It does work good, sound and function are fine. I was hoping to get 3G speeds, but finally read a older post that this phone are for European 3G. The channels are not the same in the US. Don't buy if you think it will work here. My Straight Talk T-Mobile sims works great, but only Edge speeds. I have a AT&T; sims that is 3G and still no 3G. Straight Talk (Walmart) and at T-Mobile tell me that I have to have a data plan because this is a smart phone. Why pay for something you can get.It has froze up at least 10 times, but nothing bad. The only other thing that I don't understand is the numbers that I add to contacts. I can type in 7045558900 and it adds (704)555-8900. You can make a call on this, but when I select message I have to change to 704-555-8900. I've read everything and can not find how to stop this.I'm going to next time I re-activate my Straight Talk, just use the unlimited talk, text and data for $30. Maybe if I don't tell what kind of phone that I have, they want know. There are MTK 6*** phones that listed 4G LTE compatibly and this may work in the US. If I can use the $30 plan I'll still be happy. In two months with this phone, I have never needed 3G. The wifi works for anything that I want to get from Google Play or the web.

Reviews.Title: Loving my new phone
Reviews.Author: johnie m. thomas
Reviews.Content: I love my new phone I got it in way less time than stated, it was package very secure I almost had trouble getting in the box it was package so tight. I would recommend this phone to anyone I would also recommend this seller to anyone I will also being using this seller again for more products. Thank You, Thank You, Thank You..JMThomasGreenville, Ms.,USA

Reviews.Title: Pretty good!
Reviews.Author: MJ
Reviews.Content: this phone is pretty good, Android 4.0 :) The back camera is  okay, it has flash, the front is not so good, but it gets the job done.(I haven't used video calling yet) the internet is not 4G its 3G but if you use WiFi, its perfect. The Volume buttons are on the right instead of the left, so you need to use iphone bumpers because the cases wont fit right. The speaker sounds kind of cheap if you're listening to music at high volume.Screen is nice and bright. All in all this phone is a good product! *edit* *5 months later*(November 17,2013) still works great! No complaints yet.

Reviews.Title: seemed good
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: thought this was a good clone at first but because of how it runs i lose service dont get texts and it just randomly shuts off and the screen is very fragile

Reviews.Title: Buy at your own risk
Reviews.Author: BrookeDanielle
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone and expected a version of an iPhone 4 or 4s. When i received it about a week early it was a version of the iPhone 5 instead, which was a nice surprise. I was so excited when i got it, it was a really cool phone. But there were some issues. First, the reception was terrible and i would randomly loose signal and it wouldn't allow me to be on the internet. Also, most of the phone was in Chinese and i was not able to change it but changing the language setting. Siri Doesn't work. I ended up sending the phone back because as soon as i let it die it wouldn't charge. I really liked the phone itself and wouldn't have returned it if it would've charged while turned off.

Reviews.Title: iphoney
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: iphone  look alike .good ass cell, not iphone but just as good if not beater ,iphone two much money and 2 sim.

Reviews.Title: Mine Works
Reviews.Author: 2cen
Reviews.Content: Two Months with the phone and I've learned to double click to go to desktop, hover over to delete a message, hold the button to bring up menus, hold the start button or pull the battery to revive a freeze (though I haven't experienced this yet).I believe if you want 3G you'll have to go with tmobile or att and not the cheap piggy-backers. I get edge (enhanced 2G)with my cheap network. The data is slow(maybe even throttled)but messaging is fine,SMS is fine.My buddys with older android os's are jealous of ice cream sandwich, although they can surf the internet 10xs faster, but they're also paying 2xs as much.Mine came with a chinese browser but with play store. So I was able to load english chrome or whatever, using play store.Not sure why gps is so bad (slow network?) but it rarely works. No built in compass either so night sky will be useless.All that being said I'm pretty happy with what the phone does do well. I was looking for a "cheap" sim phone to get cheap no contract service and I thought the iphone android novelty was pretty cool.3/19 visiting Oregon and pleased to see the phone gets the hspa band which is way faster.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: pomaikai
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It is a great phone. Easy to use. If you are new to smartphones then this is a good phone to start with.

Reviews.Title: good a cheap
Reviews.Author: S. Rodionov
Reviews.Content: A bit funky after iphone, but you cant argue for a price that this is good phone.and ability to reuse apple cables from pre iPhone5 era is awesome.battery is so-so but you get two of them.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: tia
Reviews.Content: this is a great phone i ordered some iphone 5 cases that fit well on it. it has never froze up. i was expecting the little android on the back but it didnt have it on there. the front camera has low quality. You will need great lighting for the front camera to work well. The flash is good. Service isnt as good. Battery stays charged for 85% of the day. Other than that looks just like a iphone. Though they sent me the wrong phone which I was kind of angry about at first but now I like it. The main reason I ordered it was because of the cute little android there instead of the apple.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn
Reviews.Content: This looks like a great phone, but once you have used it for  a week or soo you will see its defectsWhat happens is it does not recive 3G network, you do get service as for me i have tmobile and the network is ok< But most of the time there is no serves and the phone dies very quickly doesnt even last me all day. I would recomend not buying itIt was a big mistake to buy it now i have to waste double the money and buy a new one :( what a bad job of them

Reviews.Title: i have a question?
Reviews.Author: ryan
Reviews.Content: i would really like to know if regular iphone cases fit on the phone or do i have to buy one from china?

Reviews.Title: Good service, good cell phone... for me it's a good purchase
Reviews.Author: victor
Reviews.Content: I've received in less than ten days... 5The cell phone is in good state... 5It's performance is good...5The price... the price was the best..5

Reviews.Title: Sent Me The Wrong Phone =/
Reviews.Author: Teneshia M. Perkins
Reviews.Content: I was really excited to finally have another cell after a few years of being without one. Waited over a week (shipped from China) .... didn't mind that too much ..... but they sent me the wrong phone. They sent me a white one instead of black. I wouldn't be so irritated if it weren't for the fact that I hadn't had a legit cell in like 4 years and I wanted one I really would like and keep. So, I guess I'll send it back . I'm too impatient to wait another almost 2 weeks for another one. Oh well.

Reviews.Title: All fives?
Reviews.Author: Edward Maher
Reviews.Content: I'm curious about the all fives given when the review stated it had froze three times and was slow and fast at different times. I would think it should have score of 4, rather than perfection.
